name: ZOMBITAIRE
description:
Zombitaire is a zombie survival solitaire card game. The world of Zombitaire is unforgiving and harsh. You will most likely die a horrible, agonizing death. When the game starts you find yourself unarmed, alone and without a safe house but at least you are well-rested and have a few days worth of food.

The game is going to be a physical game once released but for now, you can play the game on https://screentop.gg/@Jocher/Zombitaire

In order for you to be able to play, you'll need to download the rules here, in the downloads section.

If you appreciate the game, have questions or just want to have a chat join my discord server: https://discord.gg/fXGntNKgRx

Since this a game that is still in development I appreciate any type of feedback I can get!
You can contact me via the discord server or by writing an email to jochergames@gmail.com
